pages.text: The turret automatically aims and shoot at enemies.

Can be refueled by right clicking the turret with $(l:ammo/turret_ammo)turret ammo$(). With right-click, you can change the targeting conditions. Also, as engineer, you can dismantle the turret by hitting the turret with the $(l:tools/turret_wrench)turret-wrench$(). The turret will still hold the ammo after it was dismantled.
